item.title: Dell CS24-SC BMC Remote Control not working? Try 32-bit Java 7!
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
When it comes to Java and Dell Remote Access Cards or BMCs, a simple Java update can render remote access completely useless. The older the hardware the more likely an update is going to break the KVM software. In this case with the Dell CS24-SC, I have found the BMC tends to specifically like 32-bit […]

The post Dell CS24-SC BMC Remote Control not working? Try 32-bit Java 7! first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Dell CS24-SC BIOS & BMC v2.5 Firmware Download
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Here are the most current BIOS and BMC firmwares available for the Dell CS24-SC that I know of. The BMC upgrade makes the fans considerably less loud and has a few upgrades to the BMC Software/Web GUI. With the Bios update I am now able to run Windows Server 2012 and Windows 8.1 on the […]

The post Dell CS24-SC BIOS & BMC v2.5 Firmware Download first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Dell CS24 ESXi 5.5 Install Stuck “Relocating modules and starting up the kernel…”
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.category: Relocating modules and starting up the kerne
item.description:
I recently upgraded my ESXi boxes from ESXi 5.1 to 5.5, and while I had no issues when installing ESXi 5.1 originally, I did happen to run into a few hiccups with 5.5. The issues were mainly on my Dell CS24-SC servers, but I had no issues with my PowerEdge 1950 GII or 2950 GII […]

The post Dell CS24 ESXi 5.5 Install Stuck “Relocating modules and starting up the kernel…” first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Dell CS24-SC Using the on-board Baseboard Management Controller (BMC)& IPMIView (Video)
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
The Dell CS24-SC and on-board BMC      The Dell CS24-SC is a unique piece of server hardware, packed with CPU and RAM but limited on bells and whistles. With no DRAC option available, the only way to remotely manage this server is the built-in Baseboard Management Controller or BMC. Now this isn’t necessarily a bad thing […]

The post Dell CS24-SC Using the on-board Baseboard Management Controller (BMC)& IPMIView (Video) first appeared on RobWillis.info.
